attributes.action: Innovative Martial Arts Academy for children in inner city areas of London.
attributes.additional_details:
Benefits to students , self regulation, self discipline, improved academic perfomance, tackling obesity, encouraging courtesy, integrity, perservarance, self control and idomitable spirit.
Cuidar (2004)
Stevenson, Lee et al 1990
Woodwards (2009)
attributes.background: Martial Arts a vehicle to teach self-discipline. Project identified potential benefits within the community through participation. Project aimed to highlight the tangible and intangible benefits on an indivdual level & segmented group.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. Youth services in your local area are the responsibility of your local council.

You could raise your issue with a local councillor, who represents you. You can use this page to find out who your local councillors are, and how to contact them:
https://www.gov.uk/find-your-local-councillors
